Name: Dinesh Gundu Rao
Tweet: Excellent choice by @INCIndia for #RajyaSabhaElections. Grassroots committed leaders and staunch #Kannadigas, from simple backgrounds have been given an opportunity. Rich businessman & Kerala NDA Vice-Chairman @rajeev_mp is #KarnatakaVirodhiBJP choice.  https://t.co/kARQ5cskGW
